reasoning: DOMINANT POSITION. 54 VP lead, now pushing to 60+ VP. Universal Connections enables 6 VP petition completion. Venditti ability provides FREE influence + gold. Full Market control denies P2 income and territory. P1's Barracks stronghold is contained - they cannot threaten Market. This turn extends VP lead while fortifying territorial control. AGGRESSIVE POSTURE MAINTAINED.
